resources.string: Что-то пошло не так. Повторите запрос позднее.
Нет соединения с сетью
This error occurs if the client cannot connect to the API.
This error occurs if the client tries to connect to the API using a protocol different from the HTTPS one.
Provider authorization was completed successfully.
Provider authorization failed because provider authorization token is not available.
Provider authorization failed because the provider was blocked. Provider cannot use the system.
Provider authorization failed because the format of the entered provider authorization token is invalid.
The operation requires provider authorization. You must authorize a provider before proceeding with the operation.
This error occurs if a user requests a document that is not available or was not uploaded by them, for example, if the requested document belongs to another user.

This error occurs if a user was requested to upload verification documents, but did not upload any of them (for example, the scanned copy of their passport) and did not select the Documents sent by email option.
User was authorized by their email address.
User was authorized by their mobile phone number.
User was authorized by their token.
User authorization failed because the provided password is invalid.
User authorization failed because the credentials required for authorization were provided in the wrong format.
User authorization failed because the user with the specified credentials was not registered in the system.
User authorization failed because the mobile phone number specified during authorization belongs to more than one user.
User authorization failed because their account is blocked.
User authorization failed because the provided authorization token was not found.
User authorization failed because the provided authorization token is no longer active and cannot be used.
User is not authorized.
This error occurs if a required parameter is missing from the request.
This error occurs if the available provider/user authorization header is invalid.

The requested operation cannot be performed because it is prohibited by the current workflow. For example, if a user that has a live (not closed) loan tries to apply for another one, the GeneralValidation: WorkflowValidationError occurs, because users can have only one live loan.
This error occurs if a user did not fill in all required fields or entered data is invalid and does not meet field requirements.
Credit card was not found.
User\'s credit card verification was completed successfully. This message is displayed to inform about successful card validation when adding a card, performing payment with 3D Secure, etc.
The credit card cannot be set as a primary card because it does not belong to the user who is trying to perform this operation.
The credit card cannot be selected as a primary card.
Internal service problem occurred. Please contact MoneyVeo.
Error on adding a credit card. The card was not added to the user\'s account.
Payment was not found. This message identifies the payment status.
The payment was declined by an external payment system.
The number of attempts to enter the amount of money blocked during card verification was exceeded.
The entered amount of money blocked during card verification is invalid.
User registration failed because such user already exists.
Registration of the user account was completed successfully.
The provided promo code is valid and has been activated successfully.
The provided promo code is invalid and cannot be used.
This error occurs if a user tries to apply personalized promo code while they are not authorized in the system.
The provided promo code has expired and cannot be used
